articles.title: Damaged Russian Soyuz Capsule Returns to Earth — Roscosmos - The Moscow Times
articles.description: A Russian unmanned Soyuz MS-22 capsule returned to Earth on Tuesday from the International Space Station (ISS), landing in Kazakhstan three months after experiencing a coolant leak.
articles.content:
